title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5025.1 - Purpose
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5025.1 - Purpose

State Regulations

This Part implements section
645
of the Retirement and Social Security

Law added by chapter 640 of the Laws of 1998 providing for the reinstatement of
a prior membership in a public retirement system. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5025.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
